channel.title: How do i reduce cash for stall?

item.title: How do i reduce cash for stall?
item.dc:creator: @99range_k0 99range k0
item.description:
@99range_k0 wrote:

This may or may not work, as servers vary as you know. Heres what I do.
Go to client.java, and search for name of the stall you want to change, lets use gem stall as an example.
Ctrl+F : Gem Stall
you’ll get something similiar to this

case 2562: TheifStall("gem stall", "and recieve 2.5m", 60, 500 * playerLevel[17], 995, 2500000, 30, 0x340); break;
995 = item code for gold.
2500000 = amount of gold.

lets say you want to change it from 2.5m to 250k. heres the code

case 2562: TheifStall("gem stall", "and recieve 250k", 60, 500 * playerLevel[17], 995, 250000, 30, 0x340); break;

If you have a message saying how much you receive, make sure you edit it so the msg doesn’t say “you received 2.5m” when you only receive 250k
Hope I helped

Read full topic
item.source: How do i reduce cash for stall?
